description: The schedule for Monday through Friday will remain unchanged.
title: A Souper Jenny location is closing one day a week for the summer
title_page: A Souper Jenny location is closing one day a week for the summer
text:
One Souper Jenny location is adjusting its operating hours for the summer.
The Decatur restaurant will be closed on Saturdays beginning this weekend, a Facebook post says. It will reopen on Saturdays by Labor Day, which is the weekend of the AJC Decatur Book Festival.
The schedule for Monday through Friday will remain unchanged. The other three locations — Westside, Brookhaven and Buckhead — will remain open on Saturdays.
The Buckhead eatery, in the Atlanta History Center, is open on Sundays.
Owner Jenny Levison recently confirmed that she’ll relocate the Decatur location due to parking concerns when her lease is up at the end of January. The address is 1 West Court Square.
